name: Jesse's Home
description:
Jesse lives on a small planet in the middle of space. They are lonely. However, with the help of their Address Book, Jesse can record messages which are then transmitted through the cosmos to their friends.

This game was made in 48 hours with candle's Flicksy for the Global Game Jam 2019 (Theme: What Home Means to You)

Click different objects to progress through the game. You can download Jesse's Address Book below as a supplement guide to the game to reference your friends' phone numbers.

This game uses the following diversifiers:

  • Use the Source, Luke: Use one or more open source tools, game engines, or libraries in your game.
  • The Guide I Was Looking For: Your game has a supplementary guide, using different medium than the game itself, that players must refer to to beat the game.
  • Happy Anniversary: Your game should incorporate 2018's theme (Transmission) as well as 2019's theme.

Dedicated to all my friends - past, present, and future
